Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Mayor to give the highest priority to recruiting businesses in the City to employ youth in year-round and summer jobs and to expand the City's Commission on Youth Empowerment Services.
Items.MatterName: Recruiting businesses in the City to employ youth in year-round and summer jobs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of a Code of Conduct to coaches, parents and players participating in a youth sports program that utilizes City facilities and/or receives City funding and to establish appropriate standards of behavior at youth sports events.
Items.MatterName: Code of Conduct to coaches, parents and players participating in a youth sports program.
